name: Sailwars
description: Sailwars is an NFT game that combines SLG strategy warfare, simulation management, plundering, PvP & PvE battles, and Alliance wars. The game is set in the backdrop of medieval naval warfare, where players can establish their own empires on the vast sea, compete with other players for maritime dominance, form alliances, participate in national wars, and strive to seize the ultimate "one piece." The gameplay of the game is similar to "Clash of Kings" (COK), where players can engage in resource collection, city construction, technological research, naval expansion, and other methods to fully experience the charm of strategic gaming.
